non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability, Right to object, Rights in relation to automated decision making and profiling.
non_compliant.amend: You should include a comprehensive privacy policy that outlines individuals' rights under GDPR, including how you collect, use, store, and process personal data. You should specify the legal basis for data processing, data retention policies, and data security measures. You should also provide contact information for data protection inquiries and complaints.
